<a href="{{ "/index" | relative_url }}">Home</a> &gt; <a href="{{ "/browser-logs" | relative_url }}">@datadog/browser-logs</a> &gt; <a href="{{ "/browser-logs.logsglobal" | relative_url }}">LogsGlobal</a>

## LogsGlobal interface

The public API for the Datadog Browser Logs SDK. Provides methods to initialize the SDK, manage global/user/account contexts, and interact with loggers for collecting and forwarding logs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface LogsPublicApi extends PublicApi 
```
**Extends:** PublicApi
